alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 22 at 2:51PM MDT until March 22 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...The Sangre De Cristo mountains above 11000 feet. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS... Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 120 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
